item.description:
Join us for a scenic hike with like-minded people and their pooches!
Bandanas, goodies and fun for all :)

All breeds and people welcome!

Proceeds to benefit the New England Bully Breed Club! HIKE for a CAUSE!

Your dog should be up to date on his vaccinations. Don't forgot water and poop bags!

Location: Milford Upper Charles Trail ("Milford Bike Trail"), Milford, MA (directions below)
Time: Meeting at 3:30p, Saturday, May 16th


Directions: Take Rt. 495 North to Exit 20 (Milford/Rte 85 exit). Take a left at the exit ramp traffic lights onto Rt 85. Continue through the 1st set of lights to the intersection of Rt. 85 & Rt. 16 (Main St. in Milford). Take a right onto Rt. 16. At the next full traffic light at Sacred Heart Church (on your left), you will see the Commuter Parking Lot with the Trailhead entrance located at the rear of the parking lot. This is the start of the Trail.

Paid Members: FREE
Non-Paid Members: $8.00
Guests: $10.00

Proceeds to benefit the New England Bully Breed Club! HIKE for a CAUSE!

RSVP to this email! Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: The white New England Bully Breed Club T-Shirts and gorgeous dogs :)
item.name: Sunset Dog Walk to benefit the New England Bully Breed Club!
